means: 乌头，从乌头的根提炼出的强心止痛剂
[医]（所有格aconiti）[拉]乌头属：有毒毛茛草之一属

sentence.Network_en: Guidance of taking reasonable medicine is important factor to prevent aconitum poisoning.
sentence.Network_cn: 指导患者合理用药是预防乌头中毒的重要因素.

sentence.Network_en: Aconitum is one of an important officinal and noxious plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 乌头是一种重要的药用和有毒植物之一.

sentence.Network_en: Dominant genera were mainly Polygonum, Aconitum, and so on.
sentence.Network_cn: 优势属主要有蓼属和乌头属等.
